description: Kandoliya temple, located 2km from Pauri town amidst the picture perfect surrounding is dedicated to Kandoliya Devta. The presiding deity of the temple is Lord Shiva and also houses idols of Bhumi Devta.

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 170 km away from Pauri
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun JollyGrant Airport is the Nearnest Airport and is 190 km away from Pauri
howToReach.byRoad: Most people prefer to drive down to pauri garhwal. It takes approximately five hours from Dehradun to cover the 200-km stretch.

description: Nainital Lake, a natural freshwater body, situated amidst the township of Nainital is one of the four famous lakes of Kumaon hills in the state of Uttarakhand.

howToReach.byTrain: Kathgodam Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 34 km away from Nainital
howToReach.byAir: Pantnagar Airport is the nearest airport and is 70 km away from Nainital
howToReach.byRoad: Nainital is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Jim Corbett National Park is the oldest national park in India and was established in 1936 to protect the endangered Bengal tiger.

howToReach.byTrain: Ramnagar Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 12 km away from the park
howToReach.byAir: Pantnagar Airport is the nearest airport and is 81 km away from the park
howToReach.byRoad: Jim Corbett National Park is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Mussoorie, known as The Queen of the Hills, is located in the Dehradun District of Uttarakhand.

howToReach.byTrain: Dehradun Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 36 km away from Mussoorie
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 54 km away from Mussoorie
howToReach.byRoad: Mussoorie is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Rishikesh, known as the Gateway to the Garhwal Himalayas and Yoga Capital of the World, is located in the Dehradun District of Uttarakhand.

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is within the city
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 21 km away from Rishikesh
howToReach.byRoad: Rishikesh is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Kedarnath Temple is one of the most sacred Hindu temples dedicated to Lord Shiva. It is located on the Garhwal Himalayan range near the Mandakini river.
bestTimeToVisit: May to June, September to October

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 216 km away from Kedarnath
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 238 km away from Kedarnath
howToReach.byRoad: Kedarnath is accessible by a 16 km trek from Gaurikund, which is well connected by motorable roads.

description: Valley of Flowers National Park is known for its meadows of endemic alpine flowers and the variety of flora.

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 272 km away from the park
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 295 km away from the park
howToReach.byRoad: Govindghat, the base for the trek to Valley of Flowers, is well connected by motorable roads.

description: Auli is known for its beautiful snow-capped peaks and skiing resorts. It is also a popular trekking destination.

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 264 km away from Auli
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 286 km away from Auli
howToReach.byRoad: Auli is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Badrinath Temple is a Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu and is part of the Char Dham and Chota Char Dham pilgrimage circuits.
bestTimeToVisit: May to June, September to October

howToReach.byTrain: Rishikesh Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 295 km away from Badrinath
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 317 km away from Badrinath
howToReach.byRoad: Badrinath is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.

description: Chopta is known as the 'Mini Switzerland' of India. It serves as a base for trekking to Tungnath and Chandrashila.

howToReach.byTrain: Haridwar Railway Station is the nearest railway station and is 226 km away from Chopta
howToReach.byAir: Dehradun Jolly Grant Airport is the nearest airport and is 249 km away from Chopta
howToReach.byRoad: Chopta is well connected by motorable roads to major destinations of Uttarakhand.
